---
title: "About this website"
---

This website contains the lecture slides and lab material for the guest lectures by
[Jelmer Poelstra](https://research.cfaes.ohio-state.edu/people/jelmer-poelstra-phd)
([CFAES Bioinformatics Core](https://rasc.osu.edu/bioinformatics), Ohio State University)
in the graduate-level ENTMLGY 6703 Spring 2026 course
"Molecular Techniques & Data Analysis Syllabus" taught by
Peter Piermarini and Larry Phelan at OSU.

The source code for this website can be found at
<https://github.com/jelmerp/ENTMLGY6703-SP26>.
